email.title: Weekly Digest
email.text:
Hope you all have settled into second term now and are excited for what's to follow. Our second batch of IC Hack 20 tickets sold out this Friday in a record 15 seconds! So, congratulations to all of you who were able to secure a ticket, we can promise you that this year's IC Hack will be more exciting than ever!
Our committee is working hard on IC Hack 20 and if you did not manage to get a ticket, we will be holding a Volunteers' Briefing for everyone wanting to participate in the biggest event on our campus! For more information, read on!
email.heading: IC Hack 20 Volunteers' Briefing

event.text: Come find out about volunteering opportunities at IC Hack, so you can enjoy all the fun of the hackathon without the stress of hacking!

email.heading: Drinks and Pizza at the Amex Office

event.location: WeWork, 123 Buckingham Palace Road, Victoria, London, SW1W 9SH
event.text:
Are you a Student looking for a fun way to spend your summer, gain experience and meet some fantastic people?
Here at American Express we have a number of opportunities for you to come and join our teams for a 10 week Summer internship.
We’re looking for problem solvers who can drive results through precise analysis and programming methodologies. Individuals with a strong intellectual curiosity and a passion for innovation. Team players who can transform their ideas into working solutions.
To find out more we would love to invite you to come and connect with our graduates.
**RSVP by 20.01.20** at ask.campus.emea@aexp.com.

email.heading: Bank of America | GIS Summer Analyst Programme - Chester
email.sponsor:
Are you interested in a career in **cyber security**? Join our **Global Information Security** (GIS) team – a group of cyber security problem solvers thriving in an inclusive workplace. Start your career in an environment that creates opportunities for employees to grow, recognizes and rewards performance, and supports employees’ all-around wellness.
Our **Summer Analyst programme** is designed to offer you a broad and exciting experience of work as a full time Technology Analyst. During the summer, you will be **placed within one team** and have the opportunity to participate in the **real delivery** of **technology security solutions**.
Your training and development is our top priority, with **extensive formal training** offered at the start of the programme in addition to on the job support, educational speaker events and mentorship throughout.
As a Summer Analyst, you will be a member of the GIS team, providing you with the opportunity to be part of a world-class information security workforce. Our teams cover all aspects of Information Security including cyber forensics and we look forward to finding the right opportunity for you.
**To apply for our GIS Summer Analyst Programme (Chester) please click [here](https://bankcampuscareers.tal.net/vx/brand-5/candidate/so/pm/1/pl/1/opp/4324-EMEA-Chester-Global-Technology-Summer-Analyst-Programme-Global-Information-Security/en-GB)**.
**Application Deadline 9th February 2020**
